metadata.title: CVE-2022-40626 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An unauthenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript codeinside the backurl parameter and send it to other authenticated users inorder to create a fake account with predefined login, password and role inZabbix Frontend.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
